## SendableMoneyp.sendBPD() method

Send BPD tokens to an address.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
sendBPD(toAddress: string, amount: Decimalish): Promise<SentMoneypTransaction<S, MoneypReceipt<R, void>>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  toAddress | string | Address of receipient. |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | Amount of BPD to send. |
